DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study review evaluate effectiveness new educational material ( informational booklet & DVD ) promote participation genetic counseling among breast cancer survivor . There two phase study : Part 1 - reviewing newly develop educational material , Part 2 - evaluate effectiveness newly develop educational material
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Counseling Breast Cancer Survivors ( GC BC )
DOC.detailed_description: Part 1 : Intervention Development Aim 1 : Develop psychoeducational intervention ( PEI ) high-risk breast cancer survivor genetic counseling ( GC ) hereditary breast ovarian cancer ( HBOC ) . Part 2 : Intervention Pilot Aim 2 : Assess feasibility acceptability PEI perspective BC patient health care professional . Exploratory Aim 3 : Estimate preliminary efficacy PEI compare standard clinical care . We hypothesize woman intervention group high uptake GC , great increase knowledge , perceive benefit relate GC compare control group .
DOC.criteria: Part 1 : Female breast cancer patient Moffitt Cancer Center ( MCC ) eligible participate : > 18 year age ; document observable psychiatric neurological disorder would interfere study participation ( e.g. , dementia , psychosis ) ; capable speak read standard English ; attend schedule upcoming appointment genetic counseling time recruitment ; within 18 month breast cancer ( BC ) diagnosis ; previous diagnosis breast cancer ; receive referral letter GC MCC physician ; breast cancer age 50 ; bilateral breast cancer ; multiple cancer except basal cell carcinoma ; triple negative breast cancer ; ovarian cancer fallopian tube cancer age ; Ashkenazi Jewish descent ; 2 blood relative diagnose breast cancer ; blood relative diagnose bilateral breast cancer ; first degree relative diagnose breast cancer age 50 ; blood relative diagnose ovarian cancer ; 2 family member side family breast , ovarian , pancreatic , prostate cancer ; know cancer gene mutation ( BRCA 1/2 ; male relative diagnose breast cancer ; mail address work telephone number ; provide write informed consent . Part 2 : Female BC patient MCC eligible participate : > 18 year age ; document observable psychiatric neurological disorder would interfere study participation ( e.g. , dementia , psychosis ) ; capable speak read standard English ; attend schedule upcoming appointment GC time recruitment ; previous diagnosis breast cancer ; receive referral letter GC MCC physician ; breast cancer age 50 ; bilateral breast cancer ; multiple cancer except basal cell carcinoma ; triple negative breast cancer ; ovarian cancer fallopian tube cancer age Ashkenazi Jewish descent ; 2 blood relative diagnose breast cancer ; blood relative diagnose bilateral breast cancer ; first degree relative diagnose breast cancer age 50 ; blood relative diagnose ovarian cancer ; 2 family member side family breast , ovarian , pancreatic , prostate cancer ; know cancer gene mutation ( BRCA 1/2 ; male relative diagnose breast cancer ; mail address work telephone number ; provide write informed consent .
